resources.string: Please read the terms and conditions before continuing to use the app
We use your current location and app activity to track your habits
Get articles, videos, and fitness routine recommendations to help improve your mood
Track your daily moods over a period of time to see how you\'re progressing
Use your journal to keep track of your state of mind and reflect on past ideas
TALK is an app for tracking your moods and finding ways to improve it over time
